item.title: Line painting faded, 14th June
item.description:
Brookfield road there are markings for keep clear. No stopping due to school parking. These have become very faded and people park on them at school times. It is very dangerous for children. As the parking at school times is diabolical anyway. Accident waiting to happen. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars driving through pedestrian crossing when green man is lit, 13th June
item.description:
I reported this yesterday. Today I received an email saying that the enquiry has been addressed and I will have received a separate communication. Neither of these things have happened so I am reporting again, because a pedestrian will be hit by a car if this is not resolved: So many cars are turning right after their light turns red that they drive through the pedestrian crossing when the green light is lit. I've just crossed here and two cars drove through when the green pedestrian light was showing. I am thankfully funny sighted otherwise I have no doubt I would have been knocked down
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109-111, Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Style is impossible to access due to overgrown vegetation, 13th June
item.description:
Style is impossible to access due to overgrown vegetation. I couldn't take a photo of this as I can no longer access the footpath due to other issues along the route meaning it is no longer accessible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Pluck Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crops here are blocking footpath, 13th June
item.description:
The footpath runs across here to a field with a horse in it by the farm. The crop is growing here with no footpath across it and no way to follow the required path. I didn't get photos of this because the footpath that runs to this field is impassable so of course I didn't walk on the farmers field to get around it and thus couldn't take any further photos and could not carry on my walk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath blocked by vegetation, 13th June
item.description:
The footpath here runs between a hedge and the edge of the wood. This is blocked by vegetation and impassable.This has resulted in people using the farmers field which she is unhappy about.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path across field not clearly marked or accessible, 13th June
item.description:
The path goes across the meadow to the corner of the wood. Photos taken from both ends of the path across. As you can see however there are no markings for this, nor a path across the meadow which is overgrown long grass making it very difficult to cross. This has resulted in people walking down the farmers field, which after speaking to her she is very unhappy about.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Grange Estate needs street cleansing, Gotherington, 13th June
item.description:
Brunel Drive, Wickham Grove, Castle Close and Cinder Close on The Grange Estate, Gotherington all need street cleansing and weed killing. The footpaths and kerb edges have weeds growing up. I believe the roads on the Estate were adopted about two years ago and to date have not been swept since they were adopted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Wickham Grove, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All the estate voxwell lane and all roads off it, 13th June
item.description:
Grass verges up to your waste in some areas and hedges blocking access to pavements . The whole estate Hisnams field . Snowshill , furlong lane and voxwell lane is appalling and needs attention asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hisnams Field, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
